Verses: 1 akkaalaththil, Kaarpangu Dhesaadhipadhiyaagiya Erodhu Yesuvin Keerththiyaik Kelvippattu,
2 than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Ivan Yovaansnaanan; Ivan Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhaan; Aagaiyaal, Ivanidaththil Balaththa Seykaigal Vilangukiradhu Endraan.
3 erodhu Than Sagodharanaagiya Pilippuvin Manaivi Erodhiyaalinimiththam Yovaanaippidiththuk Katti Kaavalil Vaiththirundhaan.
4 enenil: Neer Avalai Vaiththukkolvadhu Niyaayamallavendru Yovaan Avanukku Solliyirundhaan.
5 erodhu Avanaik Kolaiseyya Manadhaayirundhum, Janangal Avanaith Theerkkadharisiyendru Enninapadiyaal Avargalukkup Payandhirundhaan.
6 appadiyirukka Erodhin Jenmanaal Kondaadappadugirapodhu, Erodhiyaalin Kumaaraththi Avargal Naduve Nadanam Panni Erodhai Sandhoshappaduththinaal.
7 adhinimiththam Avan: Nee Edhaikkettaalum Tharuven Endru Avalukku Aanaiyittu Vaakkukkoduththaan.
8 aval Than Thaayinaal Evappattapadiye: Yovaansnaananudaiya Thalaiyai Inge Oru Thaalaththile Enakkuth Thaarum Endru Kettaal.
9 raajaa Thukkamadaindhaan. Aagilum, Aanaiyinimiththamum, Pandhiyil Kooda Irundhavargalinimiththamum, Adhaik Kodukkak Kattalaiyittu,
10 aal Anuppi, Kaavarkoodaththile Yovaanai Sirachchedhampannuviththaan.
11 avanudaiya Sirasai Oru Thaalaththile Konduvandhu, Siru Pennukkuk Koduththaargal; Aval Adhaith Than Thaayinidaththile Kondu Ponaal.
12 avanudaiya Seeshargal Vandhu Udalai Eduththu Adakkampanni, Pinbu Poi Andha Sangadhiyai Yesuvukku Ariviththaargal.
13 yesu Adhaikkettu Avvidam Vittu, Padavil Eri, Vanaandharamaana Oru Idaththukkup Ponaar. Janangal Adhaik Kelvippattu, Pattanangalilirundhu Kaalnadaiyaai Avaridaththirkup Ponaargal.
14 yesu Vandhu, Thiralaana Janangalaik Kandu, Avargal Mel Manadhurugi, Avargalil Viyaadhiyasdhargalaayirundhavargalai Sosthamaakkinaar.

15 saayangaalamaanapodhu, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avaridaththil Vandhu: Idhu Vanaandharamaana Idam, Neramumaayitru; Janangal Giraamangalukkup Poith Thangalukkup Pojanapadhaarththangalaik Kollumpadi Avargalai Anuppividavendum Endraargal.
16 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Avargal Pogavendiyadhillai; Neengale Avargalukkup Pojanam Kodungal Endraar.
17 adharku Avargal: Inge Engalidaththil Aindhu Appamum Irandu Meengalumeyallaamal, Verondrum Illai Endraargal.
18 avaigalai Ennidaththil Konduvaarungal Endraar.

19 appozhudhu, Avar Janangalaip Pullinmel Pandhiyirukkak Kattalaiyittu, Andha Aindhu Appangalaiyum, Andha Irandu Meengalaiyum Eduththu, Vaanaththai Annaandhu Paarththu, Aaseervadhiththu, Appangalaip Pittuch Seeshargalidaththil Koduththaar; Seeshargal Janangalukkuk Koduththaargal.
20 ellaarum Saappittu Thirupdhiyadaindhaargal; Meedhiyaana Thunikkaikalaip Pannirandu Koodai Niraiya Eduththaargal.
21 sthireegalum Pillaigalum Thavira, Saappitta Purushargal Erakkuraiya Aiyaayiramperaayirundhaargal.
22 yesu Janangalai Anuppividugaiyil, Thammudaiya Seeshargal Padavil Eri, Thamakku Munne Akkaraikkuppogumpadi Avargalaith Thuridhappaduththinaar.
23 avar Janangalai Anuppivittapinbu, Thaniththu Jebampanna Oru Malaiyinmel Eri, Saayangaalamaanapodhu Ange Thanimaiyaayirundhaar.
24 adharkullaaga Padavu Nadukkadalile Serndhu, Edhirkkaatraayirundhapadiyaal Alaigalinaal Alaivupattadhu.
25 iravin Naalaam Jaamaththile Yesu Kadalinmel Nadandhu, Avargalidaththirku Vandhaar.
26 avar Kadalinmel Nadakkiradhai Sheeshargal Kandu, Kalakkamadaindhu, Aavesam Endru Solli, Payaththinaal Alarinaargal.
27 udane Yesu Avargalode Pesi: Thidankollungal, Naandhaan, Payappataadhirungal Endraar.
28 pedhuru Avarai Nokki: Aandavare! Neereyaanaal Naan Jalaththinmel Nadandhu Ummidaththil Varakkattalaiyidum Endraan.
29 adharku Avar: Vaa Endraar. Appozhudhu, Pedhuru Padavai Vittirangi, Yesuvinidaththil Poga Kadalinmel Nadandhaan.
30 kaatru Balamaayirukkiradhaik Kandu, Payandhu Amizhndhupogaiyil: Aandavare, Ennai Ratchiyum Endru Kooppittaan.
31 udane Yesu Kaiyai Neetti Avanaippidiththu: Arpavisuvaasiye, En Sandhekappattaai Endraar.
32 avargal Padavil Erinavudane Kaatru Amarndhadhu.
33 appozhudhu, Padavil Ullavargal Vandhu: Meyyaagave Neer Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Endru Solli, Avaraip Panindhu Kondaargal.
34 pinbu, Avargal Kadalaikkadandhu, Kenesareththu Naattil Serndhaargal.
35 avidaththu Manushar Avarai Innaar Endru Arindhu, Sutruppuramengum Seydhi Anuppi, Piniyaaligalellaaraiyum Avaridaththil Konduvandhu,
36 avarudaiya Vasthiraththin Oraththaiyaagilum Avargal Thodumpadi Uththaravaagavendumendru Avarai Vendikkondaargal; Thotta Yaavarum Sosthamaanaargal.
